Question: For a short time from 1993 to 1995, this person co-anchored the evening news with Connie Chung.
Hints: This person married his wife, Jean Goebel, in 1957.
Since retiring, this person has spoken out strongly about what he perceives as a lack of courage by American journalists.
A character "Dano", a imitation of this person, appears on the Brad and Britt morning show on WZTK radio.
